title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Fish Movement Pattern Recognition Imagery Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visually and spatially conceptualize over 10 fish movement patterns through 3D animation
Learners can classify fish species with 80% accuracy by observing only partial body parts (head, torso, tail)
Learners can apply at least three fish identification strategies based on movement patterns in a turbidity change simulation environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
